1761.verse: قَالَتْ|Said|66|75|2789$لَهُمْ|to them|72|91|98$رُسُلُهُمْ|their Messengers,|137|156|6645$إِن|"Not|48|67|225$نَّحْنُ|we (are)|77|96|103$إِلَّا|but|42|61|86$بَشَرٌ|a human|76|95|2873$مِّثْلُكُمْ|like you,|75|84|9543$وَلَـٰكِنَّ|but|78|87|952$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|70|184$يَمُنُّ|bestows His Grace|142|159|9544$عَلَىٰ|on|63|80|52$مَن|whom|58|75|76$يَشَآءُ|He wills|69|86|867$مِنْ|of|50|67|53$عِبَادِهِۦ‌ۖ|His slaves.|90|99|868$وَمَا|And not|72|90|46$كَانَ|is|57|94|913$لَنَآ|for us|58|94|338$أَن|that|48|84|655$نَّأْتِيَكُم|we bring you|105|142|9545$بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ|an authority|101|138|9542$إِلَّا|except|65|83|86$بِإِذْنِ ٱللَّهِ‌ۚ|by the permission of Allah.|195|203|3337$وَعَلَى|And upon|82|98|67$ٱللَّهِ|Allah|53|69|606$فَلْيَتَوَكَّلِ|so let put (their) trust|168|184|3235$ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ|the believers.|113|121|2753$

1762.verse: وَمَا|And what|83|93|46$لَنَآ|(is) for us|85|105|338$أَلَّا|that not|75|95|2011$نَتَوَكَّلَ|we put our trust|129|149|9546$عَلَى|upon|63|83|52$ٱللَّهِ|Allah,|56|76|606$وَقَدْ|while certainly|115|125|2117$هَدَٮٰنَا|He has guided us|133|146|6400$سُبُلَنَا‌ۚ|to our ways?|106|132|9547$وَلَنَصْبِرَنَّ|And surely we will bear with patience|267|293|9548$عَلَىٰ|on|63|89|52$مَآ|what|53|66|262$ءَاذَيْتُمُونَا‌ۚ|harm you may cause us.|182|222|9549$وَعَلَى|And upon|82|162|67$ٱللَّهِ|Allah|53|133|606$فَلْيَتَوَكَّلِ|so let put (their) trust|168|208|3235$ٱلْمُتَوَكِّلُونَ|the ones who put (their) trust."|231|231|9149$

1763.verse: وَقَالَ|And said|76|89|1089$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|115|20$كَفَرُواْ|disbelieved|92|118|59$لِرُسُلِهِمْ|to their Messengers,|156|182|9550$لَنُخْرِجَنَّكُم|"Surely we will drive you out|208|221|9551$مِّنْ|of|50|61|53$أَرْضِنَآ|our land|85|106|9552$أَوْ|or|41|62|154$لَتَعُودُنَّ|surely you should return|180|201|6601$فِى|to|48|69|89$مِلَّتِنَا‌ۖ|our religion."|102|123|6602$فَأَوْحَىٰٓ|So inspired|92|103|9553$إِلَيْهِمْ|to them|72|108|3030$رَبُّهُمْ|their Lord,|88|160|3627$لَنُهْلِكَنَّ|"We will surely destroy|170|242|9554$ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ|the wrongdoers.|128|164|377$

1764.verse: وَلَنُسْكِنَنَّكُمُ|And surely We will make you dwell|246|255|9555$ٱلْأَرْضَ|(in) the land|102|120|197$مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ‌ۚ|after them.|116|134|2256$ذَٲلِكَ|That|64|82|28$لِمَنْ|(is) for whoever|126|135|1356$خَافَ|fears|69|115|1574$مَقَامِى|standing before Me|147|240|8227$وَخَافَ|and fears|83|176|9556$وَعِيدِ|My Threat."|98|144|9557$

1766.verse: مِّن وَرَآئِهِۦ|Ahead of him|128|136|9560$جَهَنَّمُ|(is) Hell,|75|91|1813$وَيُسْقَىٰ|and he will be made to drink|206|222|9561$مِن|of|50|66|53$مَّآءٍ|water|58|74|9562$صَدِيدٍ|purulent.|79|87|9563$

1767.verse: يَتَجَرَّعُهُۥ|He will sip it|113|129|9564$وَلَا|but not|69|102|25$يَكَادُ|he will be near|116|149|170$يُسِيغُهُۥ|(to) swallowing it.|140|173|9565$وَيَأْتِيهِ|And will come to him|156|172|9566$ٱلْمَوْتُ|the death|85|94|1214$مِن|from|50|69|53$كُلِّ|every|57|76|185$مَكَانٍ|side,|70|89|8082$وَمَا|but not|69|88|46$هُوَ|he|48|67|298$بِمَيِّتٍ‌ۖ|will die.|72|91|9567$وَمِن وَرَآئِهِۦ|And ahead of him|142|151|9568$عَذَابٌ|(is) a punishment|135|370|72$غَلِيظٌ|harsh.|71|306|9569$

1761.verse: Their messengers said to them, "We are only men like you, but Allah confers favor upon whom He wills of His servants. It has never been for us to bring you evidence except by permission of Allah. And upon Allah let the believers rely.

1762.verse: And why should we not rely upon Allah while He has guided us to our [good] ways. And we will surely be patient against whatever harm you should cause us. And upon Allah let those who would rely [indeed] rely."

1763.verse: And those who disbelieved said to their messengers, "We will surely drive you out of our land, or you must return to our religion." So their Lord inspired to them, "We will surely destroy the wrongdoers.

1764.verse: And We will surely cause you to dwell in the land after them. That is for he who fears My position and fears My threat."

1765.verse: And they requested victory from Allah, and disappointed, [therefore], was every obstinate tyrant.

1766.verse: Before him is Hell, and he will be given a drink of purulent water.

1767.verse: He will gulp it but will hardly [be able to] swallow it. And death will come to him from everywhere, but he is not to die. And before him is a massive punishment.

1768.verse: The example of those who disbelieve in their Lord is [that] their deeds are like ashes which the wind blows forcefully on a stormy day; they are unable [to keep] from what they earned a [single] thing. That is what is extreme error.
